sense.gloss: to meet, to encounter, to see
to have an accident, to have a bad experience
to meet (by chance), to come across, to run across, to encounter, to happen upon
to meet (e.g. of rivers, highways, etc.)
encounter, running into, meeting with (e.g. an accident), being confronted with (e.g. a difficulty)
to make (someone) to meet, to let (someone) meet
to expose to, to subject to
to go through, to suffer, to experience (something unpleasant)

sdata.j: ↑帰宅↑↓きたく↓の↑途中↑↓とちゅう↓でにわか↑雨↑↓あめ↓に↑遭↑↓あ↓った。
sdata.e: I was caught in shower on my way home.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑学校↑↓がっこう↓へ↑行↑↓い↓く↑途中↑↓とちゅう↓で、↑通↑↓とお↓りを↑横断↑↓おうだん↓しているときに↑事故↑↓じこ↓に↑遭↑↓あ↓った。
sdata.e: While crossing the street on my way to school, I encountered an accident.

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓へ↑行↑↓い↓く↑途中↑↓とちゅう↓で↑通↑↓とお↓りを↑横断↑↓おうだん↓しているときに↑事故↑↓じこ↓に↑遭↑↓あ↓った。
sdata.e: While crossing the street on my way to school, I encountered an accident.

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓からの↑帰↑↓かえ↓りに、にわか↑雨↑↓あめ↓に↑遭↑↓あ↓って、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓はずぶ↑濡↑↓ぬ↓れになって↑風邪↑↓かぜ↓をひいた。
sdata.e: I was caught in a shower on my way home from school, got soaking wet and caught a cold.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑嵐↑↓あらし↓に↑遭↑↓あ↓った。
sdata.e: We were caught in a storm.

sdata.j: ↑駅↑↓えき↓へ↑行↑↓い↓く↑途中↑↓とちゅう↓でにわか↑雨↑↓あめ↓に↑遭↑↓あ↓った。
sdata.e: I was caught in a shower on my way to the station.

sdata.j: もっと↑注意深↑↓ちゅういぶか↓く↑運転↑↓うんてん↓しないと、↑事故↑↓じこ↓に↑遭↑↓あ↓いますよ。
sdata.e: Drive more carefully, or you will have an accident.

sdata.j: ひどい↑目↑↓め↓に↑遭↑↓あ↓ったよ。
ディックは↑交通↑↓こうつう↓↑事故↑↓じこ↓に↑遭↑↓あ↓った。
ついさっき↑夕立↑↓ゆうだち↓に↑遭↑↓あ↓った。
sdata.e: I was caught in a shower just now.

words.gloss: to meet, to encounter, to see
to meet (by chance), to come across, to run across, to encounter, to happen upon
